amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement certain procedures relating to the public-private competition for Federal jobs and services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in the bill to implement the revisions to OMB Circular A-76 issued in late May.

action.text: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Van Hollen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 198 (Roll no. 487).
